about_the_game:
Become the ultimate predator and dominate the competition! The Predator Equipment Pack will set you up nicely to hunt and fight those lunkers into your boat so you can take your spot on the stage with the biggest bag of bass.
Equip your boat with a new loadout of lures from Bagley and 13 Fishing, a range of rods and reels from Favorite and top it off with the intimidating Predator or Inferno Boat Wrap.
Arm yourself with the Predator Equipment Pack:
• 10 New Lures – Hunt big bass with lures from Bagley and 13 Fishing such as the Flatty Daddy
• 4 Unique Boat Wraps – Stand out on the lake with the Predator and Inferno boat wrap, hide in plain sight using the Camo wrap or be the pro angler with the Bagley boat wrap
• 10 Items of clothing – Equip the Inferno Snood/Predator Hat to match your boats style, blend in with the environment with your camo jacket or chuck on an official Bagley Hoodie
• 4 Rods – Cast with confidence using Favorite Rods such as the Jack Hammer Spinning Rod
• 4 Reels – Complete the setup from Favorite using the Fire Stick Casting or the Jack Hammer Spinning reel
• Unlock Inferno cosmetics through new Mastery Challenges

Become the ultimate predator and dominate the competition! The Predator Equipment Pack will set you up nicely to hunt and fight those lunkers into your boat so you can take your spot on the stage with the biggest bag of bass.
Equip your boat with a new loadout of lures from Bagley and 13 Fishing, a range of rods and reels from Favorite and top it off with the intimidating Predator or Inferno Boat Wrap.
Arm yourself with the Predator Equipment Pack:
• 10 New Lures – Hunt big bass with lures from Bagley and 13 Fishing such as the Flatty Daddy
• 4 Unique Boat Wraps – Stand out on the lake with the Predator and Inferno boat wrap, hide in plain sight using the Camo wrap or be the pro angler with the Bagley boat wrap
• 10 Items of clothing – Equip the Inferno Snood/Predator Hat to match your boats style, blend in with the environment with your camo jacket or chuck on an official Bagley Hoodie
• 4 Rods – Cast with confidence using Favorite Rods such as the Jack Hammer Spinning Rod

• Unlock Inferno cosmetics through new Mastery Challenges

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
